summary: Milton Keynes is a city in England, about 50 miles northwest of London. It was planned in the 1960s to relieve housing congestion in London and is known for its modern architecture and extensive parks. The city has a population of over 260,000 and offers many facilities, including theaters, cinemas, and a teaching hospital. It's also home to the Open University and several professional sports teams. Milton Keynes has a strong economy, attracting many businesses, but there are also areas with significant poverty.
title: Milton Keynes
